categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron story arcs

nodes.text: Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron: The Phantom Affair
The Phantom Affair was the second story-arc in the Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron comics. It ran from February 1 to May 1, 1996.

The brave flyers of Rogue Squadron have been assigned to the planet Mrlsst. At the heart of the mission is an auction between the New Republic and the Galactic Empire. But a figure from Wedge Antilles' past may disrupt everything.
